text: Raghav Chaitanya is an Indian playback singer. He got the Filmfare Award for Best Male Playback Singer at the 66th Filmfare Awards for the song "Ek Tukda Dhoop" from Thappad. He is the youngest artist to win that award. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Bollywood playback singers
title: Raghav Chaitanya
